short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your shopping experience on CNFans with automated features like auto-agree, dynamic referral links, gallery scrolling!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Change log:
🐐New Interface Design: We've refreshed the plugin's look to be cleaner and more user-friendly.
   
🐐Improved Clarity: The layout is now more intuitive, making it easier to navigate and use.
    
🐐Enhanced Performance: Smoother interactions for a better overall experience.

🔥 Better CNFans – Enhance Your CNFans Shopping Experience! 🛒✨
Better CNFans is a powerful browser extension designed to make your shopping on CNFans smoother and more efficient! Whether you're a frequent shopper or just browsing, this tool adds several improvements to simplify your workflow. 🚀

Key Features:
✅ Auto Agree: Automatically enables the "Agree" checkbox, so you never miss out on a deal again.

🖼️ Gallery Navigation: Seamlessly browse through product images with smooth scroll functionality.

🛠️ Better QC Photos: View and access high-quality QC photos directly from the platform for a clearer shopping 
experience.

🚫 Warm Reminder Blocker: Say goodbye to annoying popups and distractions while shopping!

Why Better CNFans?

With Better CNFans, you can shop faster, avoid unnecessary clicks, and focus on what matters—finding the best products at the best prices. 🛍️💡
